description: The director, awarded for Closely Watched Trains, died aged 82 after battling serious health issues.
title: Jiri Menzel: Oscar winning Czech director dies at 82
title_page: Jiri Menzel: Oscar winning Czech director dies at 82 - BBC News
maintext: "Dearest Jirka, I thank you for each and single day I could spend with you. Each was extraordinary. I am also grateful to you for the last three years, as hard as they were," she wrote on Facebook.
